snippet.title: Aether Games Opening - Einar's Nightmare
snippet.description:
Aether Games is a transmedia development studio focused on creating immersive experiences through games, and series.

Aether Saga (Upcoming series)
Fully CGI 3D cinematic dark fantasy series about Holda and Einar, immersing the audience into the world of Aether. Aether Saga is a captivating story set in a mystical Viking world, where ancient Norse mythology intertwines with magical elements. The narrative revolves around Holda, a wise völva (a Nordic shaman or seeress) and Einar, a young man marked by a distinctive red birthmark. Their journey begins in a Viking village, where a normal life is shattered by the arrival of dragons.

Animation by and in collaboration with noOne Studios
2024 | Composed by Dmitrii Miachin
Music Production by DFAD

Teaser dedicated to upcoming content that will be released on Aether TCG platform. 

Lyrics:
Dagskar Vigar (Dervin Ar)
DnunSkoor sKigad Gyor, Dam-mm Raagstad gvad!
Dunskar Estar, Gyor-M Der-Mar-Dervin Ar!
Bardit mbaatyr, dat! Ader, garan Qaar!

Join us everywhere!
    Play Aether: TCG: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/aether-trading-card-game-420f51
    Discord: http://discord.com/invite/aethergames
    Telegram Hub: http://t.me/aethergames
    AetherGames.io: https://aethergames.io
    Official Collections and Listings: https://x.aethergames.io/collections

Follow us on Twitter:

    Aether Games Inc: https://twitter.com/aethergamesinc
    Aether Saga: https://twitter.com/aethersaga
    Aether: Trading Card Game: https://twitter.com/aethertcg

© 2024, Aether Games, parent company of Aether Forge LTD. All rights reserved.

This video and all audio content within, including music tracks, sound effects, and any other auditory elements, are the exclusive property of Aether Games and its subsidiary, Aether Forge LTD. The content is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws and treaties around the world. All rights in the compositions, performances, and recordings are owned, controlled, or licensed by Aether Games.

No part of this video, including the audio elements, may be reproduced, distributed, or transmitted in any form or by any means, including recording, copying, or other electronic or mechanical methods, without the prior written permission of Aether Games. For permissions, write to the legal department of Aether Games.

The music and sound design in this video were created in collaboration with DF Music Organization Inc.
